mapper.select: select id, capa_id as capaId, uid, if_fake as ifFake from eb_user_capa_xs where capa_id >= #{capaId} AND uid in (select uId from eb_user_relation_flow where pId = #{uid})
select id, capa_id as capaId, uid, if_fake as ifFake from eb_user_capa_xs where capa_id >= #{capaId} AND uid in (select uId from eb_user_invitation_flow where pId = #{uid})
